short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explains and shortens tweets using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension uses AI to help users navigate Twitter in multiple ways:
1) The AI explains tweets that are missing context, that use technical language or cultural references that the user might not be familiar with. The AI can even read the image in a tweet.
2) The AI summarizes a long thread of tweets.
3) The shorten drafts replies to 280 characters at the click of a button.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

Update: Added a link to a privacy policy and fixed a login bug.
